channel.title: A4-S on Go Conference 2021 Spring
channel.description: Recent content in A4-S on Go Conference 2021 Spring

item.title: Going places...during an outage
item.description: Building an effective fallback in a distributed system can be hard. Should our systems simply give up during an outage then? Or can we do better? Join to learn some of the challenges of building a fallback and how we overcame them to reduce business impact, and not leave all our users stranded. Lyft is ride hailing app that helps users find nearby drivers and quickly get to a place they want to go.
